newsitem.title: USA: Celebrity sees improved Q4 profit.
newsitem.headline: Celebrity sees improved Q4 profit.

text.p: Celebrity Inc said Wednesday sees a better balance between demand and labor costs in the fourth quarter, and expects its gross profit margin at its Cluett unit to rebound to more typical levels.
The company also said it expects a record sales year, accompanied by significantly improved profitability in the fourth quarter.
The company said its Cluett unit supplies artificial trees, floor planters and floral arrangements.
The company said it had a strong third quarter demand in its Cluett unit, and it expects that demand to continue into the fourth quarter.

The company said Cluett in the third quarter accounted for more than 40 percent of its total sales, but the unit had higher than normal overtime costs to meet that demand. The company said those costs reduced its gross margins from the sales.
The company reported for the third quarter net income of $172,000, or $0.03 per share, compared with a net loss of $2.2 million, or $0.35 per share, for the third quarter a year ago.
